alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Carroll; Gallatin; Grant; Lewis; Mason; Owen; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 19 at 3:20PM EDT until April 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR THURSDAY... Unseasonably warm temperatures and a dry air mass is forecast on Thursday, with relative humidity values dipping into the 20 to 25% range. Additionally, breezy southwesterly surface winds of 10 mph to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph will lead to elevated fire danger across the area Thursday afternoon and early evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHERN KENTUCKY... The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM EDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 080 Switzerland, Fire Weather Zone 089 Carroll, Fire Weather Zone 090 Gallatin, Fire Weather Zone 094 Owen, Fire Weather Zone 095 Grant, Fire Weather Zone 096 Pendleton, Fire Weather Zone 097 Bracken, Fire Weather Zone 098 Robertson, Fire Weather Zone 099 Mason and Fire Weather Zone 100 Lewis. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop on Thursday will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Avoid burning. Conditions are favorable for rapid fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Bracken; Carroll; Gallatin; Grant; Lewis; Mason; Owen; Pendleton; Robertson
